name: Robo Lemming
description:
Guide Robo Lemming through the endless gauntlet by switching him on and off using the number 1 button on your keyboard as an On/Off switch.

Created for the Nokia 3310 Jam under the restrictions of the Nokia 3310 resolution (84x48 pixels) and it's 2 colours ( #c7f0d8  +  #43523d)

Theme:  On/Off
